options.A: Only a single instance of Myobject may exist within a session
options.C: The com.example.MyObject must be declared as a servlet event listener in the web application deployment descriptor
options.B: The unbound method of the Myobject instance is called when the session to which it is bound times out
options.D: The valueUnbound method of the Myobject instance is called when the session to which it is bound times out
